table.name: vtiger_threatsmeasures
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_threatsmeasures` ( `threatsmeasuresid` int(19) NOT NULL, `threatsmeasuresname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `accounts` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`threatsmeasuresid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_threatsmeasurescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_threatsmeasurescf` ( `threatsmeasuresid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`threatsmeasuresid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
